Info.description:
Modelling and control of a Magnetic Levitation System
This project explores traditional and modern control theory techniques to stabilize the position of a ferromagnetic ball suspended in a magnetic field produced by two inductors. A "Model-based design" (MBD) approach has been adopted.
Author: Tommaso Bocchietti, Daniele Cianca, Sara Orazzo Date: 00/00/2024
